thread.title: Adele Falls Apart During George Michael Tribute, Curses, Makes Everyone Start Over Again
thread.title_full: Adele Falls Apart During George Michael Tribute, Curses, Makes Everyone Start Over Again

author: Timothy Burke on Screengrabber, shared by Timothy Burke to Deadspin
title: Adele Falls Apart During George Michael Tribute, Curses, Makes Everyone Start Over Again
text:
Go to permalink 
Adele, who opened tonight’s Grammy Awards, reappeared later to perform a memorial tribute to George Michael with a rendition of his “Fastlove.” It didn’t go so well, and we all learned the realities of live television. She was sorry, though! Advertisement
